title: New Epic skins: Sweetheart Xayah and Rakan

replies.body: If I buy these skins will you give Zoe a meaningful nerf like, idk, doubling her Paddle Star, Sleepy Trouble Bubble and Ultimate ability cooldowns while also reducing the crowd control of her Sleepy Trouble Bubble?
Do we no longer get the download links with different resolutions for the splash art?
Aurelion sol has been out for nearly 2 years and yet Xayah and Rakan get skins before him
